title: God IS Providing | Guests: Rep. Chris Stewart & Johnnie Moore | 8/19/21
description:
Glenn gives an update on how much the Nazarene Fund raised to help save Afghan Christians: close to $10 million in one day, thanks to Glenn’s listeners. Rep. Chris Stewart joins to discuss American's abysmal actions in Afghanistan and President Biden’s horrible defense. Glenn goes on a rant about America’s cowardice regarding Afghanistan. Rev. Johnnie Moore joins to share the dire circumstances Afghan Christians are currently facing. What if it was your child trapped in another country, and your government said it could do nothing about it? Please continue to donate to the Nazarene Fund.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
